languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк публично арестован и пострижен в Орден Молота. Теперь он постигает науку смирения, и в словах его куда больше покорности и меньше мнимых откровений. Настоятель дозволил проповеднику посетить корабль Лорд-капитана с паломнической миссией, чтобы вознести молитвы за е{mf|го|е} здравие и освятить корабль.{/n}

{n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк публично арестован и пострижен в Орден Молота. Теперь он постигает науку смирения, и в словах его куда больше покорности и меньше мнимых откровений. Настоятель дозволил проповеднику посетить корабль Лорд-капитана с паломнической миссией, чтобы вознести молитвы за е{mf|го|е} здравие и освятить корабль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience. Prelate Hectarchius permitted the preacher to visit the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El profeta de voz pura fue arrestado en público y obligado a ingresar en la Orden del Martillo. Ahora estudia el arte de la humildad y sus palabras muestran más obediencia y menos revelaciones incómodas. Desde la orden, han autorizado que el predicador haga un peregrinaje a la nave de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para que rece por su salud y bendiga la nave.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El profeta de voz pura fue arrestado en público y obligado a ingresar en la Orden del Martillo. Ahora estudia el arte de la humildad y sus palabras muestran más obediencia y menos revelaciones incómodas. Desde la orden, han autorizado que el predicador haga un peregrinaje a la nave de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para que rece por su salud y bendiga la nave.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a été arrêté sur la voie publique et enrôlé dans l'Ordre du Marteau. Il y cultive désormais l'art de l'humilité, et en lieu et place de prétendues révélations, ses paroles n'expriment plus qu'une obéissance sans faille. L'ordre a permis au prêcheur de partir en pèlerinage sur le vaisseau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} afin de prier pour sa bonne santé et sa sécurité à bord.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a été arrêté sur la voie publique et enrôlé dans l'Ordre du Marteau. Il y cultive désormais l'art de l'humilité, et en lieu et place de prétendues révélations, ses paroles n'expriment plus qu'une obéissance sans faille. L'ordre a permis au prêcheur de partir en pèlerinage sur le vaisseau {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} afin de prier pour sa bonne santé et sa sécurité à bord.{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知被公开带走，加入了重锤修会。如今，他学会了谦卑的礼仪，不再出言无状，也不再继续传播所谓的“启示”。教长允许这位布道士领导一支朝圣团，登上领主舰长的飞船，为{mf|他|她}的健康福祉祈祷，祝愿旅行一帆风顺。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纯洁之声先知被公开带走，加入了圣锤修会。如今，他学会了谦卑的礼仪，不再出言无状，也不再继续传播所谓的“启示”。教长允许这位布道士领导一支朝圣团，登上领主舰长的飞船，为{mf|他|她}的健康福祉祈祷，祝愿旅行一帆风顺。{/n}

languages.text: {n}純声の預言者は公に逮捕され、鉄槌の修道会へと入会した。彼は今、謙遜の術を学び、そしてはるかに大きな従順を示す言葉を紡ぎ、疑惑の啓示を広めることは少なくなった。司教は、彼がロード・キャプテンの健康のために祈りを捧げ、その船を祝福することができるように、巡礼者の聖務団を導くことを許可した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}純声の預言者は公に逮捕され、鉄槌の修道会へと入会した。彼は今、謙遜の術を学び、そしてはるかに大きな従順を示す言葉を紡ぎ、疑惑の啓示を広めることは少なくなった。司教は、彼がロード・キャプテンの健康のために祈りを捧げ、その船を祝福することができるように、巡礼者の聖務団を導くことを許可した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme wurde öffentlich verhaftet und in den Orden des Hammers aufgenommen. Er studiert nun die Kunst der Bescheidenheit, und seine Worte zeugen nun von sehr viel mehr Gehorsam und enthalten deutlich weniger angebliche Enthüllungen. Der Prälat gestattete dem Prediger, eine Pilgermission zum Schiff des Lord Captains anzuführen, um für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains zu beten und {mf|sein|ihr} Schiff zu segnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme wurde öffentlich verhaftet und in den Orden des Hammers aufgenommen. Er studiert nun die Kunst der Bescheidenheit, und seine Worte zeugen nun von sehr viel mehr Gehorsam und enthalten deutlich weniger angebliche Enthüllungen. Der Prälat gestattete dem Prediger, eine Pilgermission zum Schiff des Lord Captains anzuführen, um für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains zu beten und {mf|sein|ihr} Schiff zu segnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peygamber Durusöz, herkesin gözü önünde tutuklanarak Çekiç Tarikatı'na alındı. Şimdilerde tevazu sanatı üzerine çalışıyor. Sözleriyse artık çok daha derin bir itaatkârlık gösterip çok daha az sözde vahiy yayıyor. Piskopos, vaizin Lord Kaptan'ın gemisine bir hacı misyonu düzenlemesine izin verdi. Böylece vaiz, Lord Kaptan'ın sağlığı için dualarını sunup gemisini kutsayabilecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet was publicly arrested and inducted into the Order of the Hammer. He now studies the art of humility, and his words now show far greater obedience and spread fewer alleged revelations. The prelate permitted the preacher to lead a mission of pilgrimage to the Lord Captain's ship so he could offer prayers for {mf|his|her} health and bless {mf|his|her} ship.{/n}
